WRITING.TEXT: this pains me.
Anxiety often comes as a package deal.
Thank you! it took 8 months and 20 something applications. It's so hard.
I think I will!
thank you!
thanks! that is definitely a perk I look forward to.
haha! Thanks!

WRITING.TITLE: [progress] Got a job!
WRITING.TEXT: I interviewed at a health food store two weeks ago and was waiting for a call back. Friday, I was ready to fill out more applications and give up. yesterday, I got a phone call and expected the worst, but no! I got the job! I go Tuesday to fill out new hire forms and get settled! I'm so excited.

Be safe. My thoughts are with you, your colleagues, and the fallen officers.
If you need to chat, I'm here for you. Hugs if you want them.
Glad I could be of help.
The Collie stare! Google it. It's a thing.

Nmom is a higher ranking medical professional in the state. Super conscious about her and the family's image. If anything, she will hide the medication. Thank you for your concern! It's safe now. I didn't even think of that.
Vinegar gets it off super easy!
Very important thing to remember!
I MADE A DEEEEAL FOR THAT MAN'S LIIIFE
Nmom and Ndad are medical professionals - I feel your pain!
Thank you
thank you.

this hits very close to home. I'm so, so sorry you've gone through this. my heart breaks for you. you deserve so, so much better. I understand being unable to cry. I actually asked my therapist about it a month or so ago. she said that sometimes your brain doesn't want to deal with something, even if you want to. it's a protective mechanism. your brain is keeping the stuff that hurts locked away in a box for when you are in a safe enough place to deal with it. as another user said, it's also an unconcious coping mechanism for dealing with shock and trauma. It's frustrating - sometimes it feels like things would feel a little better if you could cry!
I hope you soon come to a place where your brain feels safe enough to be vulnerable. I hope you find peace within yourself and in your life. I hope you and your daughter grows up looking up to her amazing mother. I hope you heal. hugs if you want them. keep your chin up. we're rooting for you.

WRITING.TITLE: [update] "Quit being a baby"
WRITING.TEXT:
I went to the doctor again. beginning stage of pneumonia. he gave me an order or prednisone and prescription cough syrup with codeine for pain.
I want to thank you guys for being so supportive. I figured you would want to know what happened!
I think that's where I'll end up.
Doctor prescribed it Tuesday. It's all safe

Congratulations! You look fantastic. I know that recovering from anorexia is extremely difficult and getting to this point is amazing. Stay strong, man. If you ever need to chat, feel free to PM me. Good luck in your continued recovery!
emergency appointment tomorrow morning.
That means a lot to me. I have an emergency appointment tomorrow morning.

you didn't scare me. I totally get what you're saying. I called his emergency line, I have an emergency appointment to move morning. in the mean time, I've got liquid lidocaine, penicillin, and anti inflammatories.
He knows to give me prescription forms, test referrals, etc. His office works with me on that.
Words to remember right now. Thank you.
Thank you
I understand your rage. It's so maddening. I actually just made some green tea with honey. Thanks for the hugs.
I'm calling him first thing tomorrow morning. That's what he's concerned about. I'll try to make an update.

WRITING.TITLE: [support] "Quit being a baby"
WRITING.TEXT:
over the weekend, I had a sore throat that got progressively worse. yesterday, I saw my therapist who sent me to to doctor. I told Nmom I was going and she told me it was just a sore throat and to stop being so dramatic. I went anyways (hurray for being 18). I have bronchitis. my throat is really swollen. I had my tonsils removed ten years ago and my doctor thought i still had them because of the swelling. he also said there seemed to be fluid in my lungs (bronchial tubes) and if I wasn't significantly better, to come back in on Thursday. today, my chest has started to ache. I have a wet cough, but nothing comes up. it hurts to cough. Nmom told me to "ignore the pain, stop being a baby". we were walking into a store and I had a coughing fit and started to get dizzy in the road. Nmom starts yelling at me to stop coughing and starts yelling at me that I am being dramatic.
I'm home. I took some ibuprofen and am drinking a powerade. I think I'm calling my doctor tomorrow. I feel really sick.
THE HUMANITY
